summary: The diff implements most requirements well. REQ-22 (backend no-op redeployment) is addressed with a comment added to main.mo. REQ-23 through REQ-28 are largely implemented with polished UI components. However, REQ-26's delete player functionality is explicitly removed (noted in file summaries: 'delete functionality removed since the backend has no deletePlayer method'), meaning the player list rows cannot show a delete button as required. All other requirements appear substantially addressed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Player list rows in AdminModal must show a delete button; the modal must include delete player functionality per the AC 'Player list rows are readable with name, tier, category, score, and delete button'
missing_requirements.reason: The file summary for AdminModal.tsx explicitly states 'delete functionality removed since the backend has no deletePlayer method.' The AC for REQ-26 requires a delete button in each player list row, but this has been removed.

hallucinated_features.description: A dedicated /admin route (AdminPage) with an AdminUrlCard component that displays the full /admin URL in a monospace read-only box with a Copy button showing 'Copied!' feedback
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention creating a new /admin page, an AdminUrlCard component, or a URL copy feature. The spec only requires polishing the existing AdminModal component.
